========================================
INSTRUCTIONS FOR VERCEL
========================================

1. Go to: https://vercel.com/dashboard
2. Select your project
3. Go to: Settings → Environment Variables
4. Click: "Add New"
5. Key: FIREBASE_ADMIN_CREDENTIALS
6. Value: Paste the ENTIRE string above (starts with "eyJ" and ends with "=")
7. Environment: Select ALL THREE ✅ Production ✅ Preview ✅ Development
8. Click: Save
9. Go to: Deployments tab → Click "Redeploy" on latest deployment

========================================
IMPORTANT NOTES
========================================
- ✅ Copy the ENTIRE string (it's very long - about 2000+ characters)
- ✅ Don't add quotes around it
- ✅ Make sure to select all 3 environments
- ✅ Redeploy after adding the variable
